Configuration.Sms: Dear Subscriber, your connection will be barred after 3 days. Please pay your dues soon
Configuration.SqlQuery: Select BSCODE, SUBSTR(MSISDN,4,10) AS MSISDN, CUSTCODE, CO_ID, CORPORATE_CODE,TOTAL_OVER_DUE, OVER_DUE_LOCAL, Over_DUE_IR, AVG_PAYMENT, AVG_INVOICE, LAST_INVOICE,REMARKS FROM DUE_DATE_FINAL_REPORT WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE+3)>=LBC_DATE+DUEDATE_LIMIT AND TOTAL_OVER_DUE > 0 AND ( LOCAL_BAR_STATUS = 'D' OR LOCAL_BAR_STATUS = NULL)
Configuration.Query1: INSERT INTO DUE_DATE_FINAL_REPORT_FRONTEND (BSCODE, MSISDN, CO_ID, CORPORATE_CODE, TOTAL_OVER_DUE, OVER_DUE_LOCAL, OVER_DUE_IR, AVG_PAYMENT, AVG_INVOICE, LAST_INVOICE, REMARKS, CUSTCODE, BAR_DAYS, REFRESH_DATE) Select BSCODE, SUBSTR(MSISDN,4,10) AS MSISDN, CO_ID, CORPORATE_CODE,TOTAL_OVER_DUE, OVER_DUE_LOCAL, Over_DUE_IR, AVG_PAYMENT, AVG_INVOICE, LAST_INVOICE,REMARKS, CUSTCODE, '3' AS BAR_DAYS, TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS REFRESH_DATE FROM DUE_DATE_FINAL_REPORT WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE+3)>=LBC_DATE+DUEDATE_LIMIT AND TOTAL_OVER_DUE > 0 AND ( LOCAL_BAR_STATUS = 'D' OR LOCAL_BAR_STATUS = NULL)
Configuration.SqlQuery1: Select BSCODE, MSISDN, REFRESH_DATE FROM DUE_DATE_FINAL_REPORT_FRONTEND WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) = REFRESH_DATE AND BAR_DAYS = 3
